https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cjOidUjlBXamXlGk0BJfhLqHpaU.jpg After the justice system fails the survivor of a brutal, racially-driven sexual assault, she becomes a motorcycle-riding, ass-kicking vigilante who takes on the attackers of other women who've suffered the same fate. A Red Girl's Reasoning
